property.content:
{{velocity}} #if ($doc.getObject('PhenoTips.PatientClass')) $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.UIX__content-top-menu')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.UIX__content-top-menu')## {{html clean="false" wiki="true"}}
{{menu id="pr-more-actions-menu" type="horizontal"}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'view') #if($hasEdit && !$isReadOnly) #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) * [[{{icon name="pencil" /}} $services.localization.render('core.menu.edit')>>path:$doc.getURL($editaction, $!languageparams)|| id="prActionEdit"]] #end## HAS EDIT #set ($canDelete = !$doc.isNew() && $xwiki.checkAccess($doc.fullName, 'delete')) #if ($canDelete) * [[{{icon name="times" /}} $services.localization.render('core.menu.delete')>>path:$doc.getURL('delete', $!languageparams) || id="prActionDelete"]] #end## HAS DELETE #else## NOT IN VIEW MODE, SHOW EDIT MODE ACTIONS * {{icon name="check" /}} Save ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} ** {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} * {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} #end## DONE WITH EDIT MODE SPECIFIC ACTIONS * {{html clean="false"}} Jump to...{{/html}} ##THE ToC will be populated by JS ** ---- * {{icon name="cog" /}} More actions #if ($xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'content') ** [[Open in view mode>>$doc.fullName|| title="Open record in view mode in a new window" target="__blank"]] #end #if ($isAdvancedUser && $xcontext.action != 'view' || $viewer != 'history') ** [[History>>path:$doc.getURL('view', 'viewer=history') || target="__blank" title="See how the record was modified over time since its creation"]] #end #if ($xwiki.getDocument($xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')).getObject('XWiki.PDFClass')) #set ($pdfTemplate = $xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')) #else #set ($pdfTemplate = 'PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode') #end ** (% class="empty" %)---- ** [[Export PDF>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=pdf&pdfcover=0&pdftoc=0&pdftemplate=${pdfTemplate}") || class="export-link"]] #if($isAdvancedUser) ** [[Export XAR>>path:$doc.getURL('export', "format=xar&name=${doc.fullName}&pages=${doc.fullName}")|| class="export-link"]] ** [[Export JSON>>path:$xwiki.getURL('PhenoTips.PatientPhenotypeExportService', 'get', "id=${doc.name}") || class="export-link"]] #end #set ($hasExtensions = false) #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) #set ($hasExtensions = true) #end #if ($hasExtensions) ** ---- #foreach ($e in $services.uix.getExtensions("org.phenotips.patientRecordMenu.moreActions")) ** {{html clean=false}}$services.rendering.render($e.execute(), 'xhtml/1.0'){{/html}} #end #end {{/menu}}
{{/html}} #end{{/velocity}}
